channel.title: Spammers
channel.description:
Hey everyone, i got a server and people are spamming like crazy. i was wondering what should i do. so i came up with a few idea about hacking there server but where do i get the bots and cheat client and stuff or sum other stuff or sumthing.
Please help

item.title: Spammers
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

GUYS, please hes asking for help, DONT FLAME!(in forum rules flaming help section is against rules!!!)

well to answer you question ill give u a link or 2 to stop syi and i will tell you how to stop
anti floding on the yell system.

http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=243
http://silabsoft.org/smf/index.php?showtopic=260

and use these

if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)
&& (playerRights >= 3) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null; try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                }

thatll ipban and ipmute, it works very well,(TESTED)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2009, 08:16:31 am[/size][hr]and more links

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,322520.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,286718.0.html

these should also help.

if you have any other questions im me at zephyr9129@yahoo.com

Read full topic
